text: José Rómulo Sosa Ortiz (February 17, 1948 — September 28, 2019), https://www.elnuevodia.com/entretenimiento/musica/nota/muereelprincipedelacancionjosejose-2520528/ known by his stage name José José, was a Mexican singer, musician and occasional actor. His 1983 album Secretos has sold over 20 million units. With a large number of international hits, he received several Grammy nominations and recognition worldwide. In March 2017, he announced that he was diagnosed with pancreatic cancer. On 28 September 2019, José José died of the disease at a hospital in Homestead, Florida, at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Mexican singer-songwriters Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican pop singers Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Florida Category:Actors from Mexico City Category:Singers from Mexico City
title: José José
